title: Is Warren Buffett’s 1994 Berkshire Hathaway Prediction Finally Coming True? He Warns ‘A Fat Wallet is the Enemy of Superior Investment Results’
full_text: Is Warren Buffett’s 1994 Berkshire Hathaway Prediction Finally Coming True? He Warns ‘A Fat Wallet is the Enemy of Superior Investment Results’. Warren Buffett has often said Berkshire is getting too big to see the same sizeable returns they saw for most of their lifetime. As Greg Abel takes over, is .... Bottom Line Up Front: Warren Buffett has long predicted that theyre getting too big to see the sizeable returns they saw for the first many years of Berkshire Hathaway's (BRK.A) (BRK.B) lifetime, but… [+3865 chars]
